commit.message: Add a note about feature(explicit_generic_args_with_impl_trait) to the relevant error message

verification.payload:
tree eda0fd922b64c54b44cf356f6bd81a9a7bf036cf
parent 3e3890c9d4064253aaa8c51f5d5458d2dc6dab77
author Jakub Kądziołka <kuba@kadziolka.net> 1636393162 +0100
committer Jakub Kądziołka <kuba@kadziolka.net> 1636397381 +0100

Add a note about feature(explicit_generic_args_with_impl_trait) to the relevant error message

files.patch:
@@ -3,6 +3,9 @@ error[E0632]: cannot provide explicit generic arguments when `impl Trait` is use
    |
 LL |     assert_eq!(f::<4usize>(Usizable), 20usize);
    |                    ^^^^^^ explicit generic argument not allowed
+   |
+   = note: see issue #83701 <https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83701> for more information
+   = help: add `#![feature(explicit_generic_args_with_impl_trait)]` to the crate attributes to enable
